spec.scope: Metamodel and data categories for multilingual annotation

info.p: MLIF provides a generic platform for modeling and managing multilingual information in various domains: localization, translation, multimedia, document management, digital library, and information or business modeling applications. It also provides a metamodel and a set of generic data categories for various application domains.

Similar to ISO 16642:2003 in terminology, MLIF introduces a metamodel in combination with chosen data categories as a means to ensure the interoperability between several multilingual applications and corpora.
MLIF uses data categories according to ISO 12620:2009
